entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 28 April 2023
